title: Unwritten HR Rules: 21 Secrets For Attaining Awesome Career Success In Human Resources
description: Frustrated with your career progress in HR?Passed over for promotions you know you should have received?Not getting the appreciation, recognition and rewards you know you deserve?Then discover the strategies the best HR pros on the planet use to advance their careers.In this ground-breaking book, Unwritten HR Rules, Alan Collins, former Vice President of Human Resources at PepsiCo and currently Founder of Success in HR, reveals secrets for taking your HR career to the next level and attaining the success in HR you've always desired and dreamed of.It doesn't matter if you're a seasoned HR generalist, an HR leader, an HR specialist in talent acquisition, employee relations or any other key function or just launching your career right out of school, you'll find this book useful.Unwritten HR Rules has been developed to provide you with one thing and one thing only: practical, actionable career advancement wisdom you can use right now. It doesn't strive to be "politically correct," sugarcoat any messages or conceal the realities of what it takes to move your career forward in HR. It can and does tell you like it is.Grab this book and you'll discover:
author: Alan Collins
